column4: Hi. I just bought a new usb flash drive. However, Ubuntu is not recognizing it when I plug it into my notebook (I'm running Ubuntu 10.04). Does any know have any clue about what's going on or what I can do to fix it?
what do u mean not recognized??
i think your flashdrive has hardware errors then, you still have warranty?
according to this page i dont think linux is supported http://www.pqi.com.tw/product2.asp?cate1=200&proid=344
well...by the look of things...it kinda means it doesnt...
calling who?? sorry i wasnt paying attention
so do you suggest me to format it/
if the warranty is not void by doing so then by all means
or you can try google for some answers if someone else finds it not supported
this link http://www.pqi.com.tw/product2.asp?cate1=19&proid=415 explicitly states that Linux systems are not supported. Sorry
It says only the application software.
